token.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a round piece of metal that you use instead of money in some machines
token.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: something that represents a feeling, fact, event etc
token.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Please accept this gift as a small token of our appreciation.
a token of your gratitude/respect/appreciation etc
token.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a token action, change etc is small and not very important, and is usually only done so that someone can pretend that they are dealing with a problem
token.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The government thinks it can get away with token gestures on environmental issues.
token.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: done as a first sign that an agreement, promise etc will be kept and that more will be done later
token.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: A small token payment will keep the bank happy.
token.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: a piece of paper, card, plastic etc that can be exchanged for goods
token.translation[2].definitions[0].exam: Collect eight of these tokens and send off for a free recipe book.
token.translation[3].definitions[0].defi: done or given only as a small sign of something larger or more important
token.translation[3].definitions[0].exam: a token cut in interest rates
There is a token charge (=a small charge that does not cover the actual cost of something) for the use of the database.
The players were amateurs and received only a token payment plus expenses.
